body_html:
@soumith @SsnL The two references for Cholesky gradients that I know of are

  • https://people.maths.ox.ac.uk/gilesm/files/NA-08-01.pdf
  • https://arxiv.org/abs/1602.07527

It's implemented in tensorflow and autograd here:

  • https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/linalg_grad.py#L58
  • https://github.com/HIPS/autograd/blob/master/autograd/numpy/linalg.py#L110

I think it's also implemented in stan somewhere as well but I'm not sure where exactly.

I haven't thought too much about triangular solve gradients yet but I know that they're implemented in tensorflow here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/linalg_grad.py#L207.
